name: Grobo (itch)
description:
GROBO

Grobo is a 2D puzzle game where you manipulate gravity to overcome hazards and obstacles while exploring the world of Megatropolis. Available Now!

A story of mystery, loneliness, hope, and redemption, help g.R0b0 (a.k.a. Grobo) venture through the neglected yet colorful world of the future.

Beckoned by a mysterious voice in its head to travel to the outermost layer of the world.  Grobo  journeys into the rusted, rundown ruins of the future to uncover the mysteries of who this voice belongs to, what happened to Megatropolis, the people, the other robots and above all, to find a friend.
